dmca.title: cease and desist
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


-----Original Message-----
From: eric mirshak [mailto:airborneinfantrycombatant@yahoo.com] 
Sent: Thursday, February 01, 2007 9:10 PM
To: Copyright; sushilrajput@hotmail.com; admin@rensofttechnosys.com
Cc: eric.mirshak@us.army.mil
Subject: cease and desist

i recieved an email from one of my fans recently
regarding this website 
i have been having an issue with identity theft over
the past couple years
and i have recently discovered that my copyrighted
images and name have popped up on an escort service
website being hosted by your company
i have tried to send e-mails to all contacts to this
company and all have been sent back as undeliverable,
i also tracked this back to a man named
Sushil Raghav in india
i have sent him severlal email meesages and tried to
contact him on the phone based off of the number
listed on his india tours and travel website only to
find out this number is disconnected.
i was also able to hack the password to the escort
site to try to remove my images and name from this
escort site and it will not allow me to delet this
profile
the website is 
www.chicago-escort-service.us
the profile name is under RICKYSINZ
here is the info based off of dnsstuff
Domain        Type        Class        TTL        Answer
chicago-escort-service.us.        A        IN        14400        70.84.62.2
chicago-escort-service.us.        NS        IN        86400
ns4.1uphost.com.
chicago-escort-service.us.        NS        IN        86400
ns3.1uphost.com.
if my name and images are not removed from this
illegal website, i will be forced to take legal action
holding the webhost service liable for slander and
showing me in an unfair likeness.
this is an outrage to be viewed in this sort of lite,
any and all help would be greatly appreciated.
thank you.
in addition thiose photos were taken of my when i was
17 which would make your company liable for showing a
child on an escort website.
this will be the last letter i take before going to
the press and taking legal action against you.



 
________________________________________________________________________
____________
We won't tell. Get more on shows you hate to love 
(and love to hate): Yahoo! TV's Guilty Pleasures list.
http://tv.yahoo.com/collections/265
